snippet: HERRMANN--Ruth, May 11, 1913-January 3, 2014. Loving and beloved wife of Louis, who predeceased her. Adored mother of Frederica and Marvin Amstey, Patricia and Stephen Brecher. Devoted grandmother of Ross Amstey and Trish Annese, Karen and Cyril L...
lead_paragraph: HERRMANN--Ruth, May 11, 1913-January 3, 2014. Loving and beloved wife of Louis, who predeceased her. Adored mother of Frederica and Marvin Amstey, Patricia and Stephen Brecher. Devoted grandmother of Ross Amstey and Trish Annese, Karen and Cyril Lemaire, Ethan Brecher, Jennifer and Kenneth Burstiner. Beloved and cherished great-grandmother of Logan, Jordan, Celine, Annelise, Isabelle, Sarah, Anna, Emma. Private graveside services.
